channel.title: Server Run Error
channel.description:
The server starts up great, but then crashes at the login screen. This is what appears:
[code] Imagine Reality Client java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 71766 at Model.method460(Model.java:49) at client.preloadModels(client.java:906) at client.startUp(client.java:8182) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5583) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Connecting to update server 60 [/code]

item.title: Server Run Error
item.dc:creator: @Tylerd21 Tylerd21
item.description:
@Tylerd21 wrote:

Server can’t connect to client.

Read full topic
